name: manectite
effect: Held: Allows Manectric to Mega Evolve into Mega Manectric.
short_effect: Held: Allows Manectric to Mega Evolve into Mega Manectric.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
One variety of the mysterious Mega Stones.
Have Manectric hold it, and this stone will
enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
